testcase.name: Test with backend "before each" hook: Login to the app for "Intercepting & Modifying the request&response(Verify correct request & response)"
testcase.classname: "before each" hook: Login to the app for "Intercepting & Modifying the request&response(Verify correct request & response)"

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://api.realworld.io/api/users/login
The response we received from your web server was:
> 503: Service Unavailable
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://api.realworld.io/api/users/login Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/121.0.0.0 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 72 } Body: {"user":{"email":"anu.bengaluru@gmail.com","password":"Ganapathi2024!"}}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 503 - Service Unavailable Headers: { "date": "Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:27:21 GMT", "content-type": "text/html; charset=utf-8", "transfer-encoding": "chunked", "connection": "keep-alive", "report-to": "{\"group\":\"heroku-nel\",\"max_age\":3600,\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https://nel.heroku.com/reports?ts=1709123241&sid=c46efe9b-d3d2-4a0c-8c76-bfafa16c5add&s=5T6jjGdeK2RjJ6v%2BkIMkFkDalZR33xorH1vBJE2mhwA%3D\"}]}", "reporting-endpoints": "heroku-nel=https://nel.heroku.com/reports?ts=1709123241&sid=c46efe9b-d3d2-4a0c-8c76-bfafa16c5add&s=5T6jjGdeK2RjJ6v%2BkIMkFkDalZR33xorH1vBJE2mhwA%3D", "nel": "{\"report_to\":\"heroku-nel\",\"max_age\":3600,\"success_fraction\":0.005,\"failure_fraction\":0.05,\"response_headers\":[\"Via\"]}", "cache-control": "no-cache, no-store", "cf-cache-status": "DYNAMIC", "server": "cloudflare", "cf-ray": "85c8a9424aad662d-AMS", "alt-svc": "h3=\":443\"; ma=86400" } Body: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Application Error</title> <style media="screen"> html,body,iframe { margin: 0; padding: 0; } html,body { height: 100%; overflow: hidden; } iframe { width: 100%; height: 100%; border: 0; } </style> </head> <body> <iframe src="//www.herokucdn.com/error-pages/application-error.html"></iframe> </body> </html>
https://on.cypress.io/request
Because this error occurred during a `before each` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `Test with backend`
